Name: FAST FOOD SHOP ONLINE
About the game: Fast Food Shop Online is an online game that can be played with up to 16 players . The game is about running a fast food shop where customers will come to your shop and order food which you have to cook and prepare . Try to get keep serving customers while the game will be increasingly getting harder over time. MULTIPLAYER SUPPORT The game can be fully played in multiplayer mode with friends , friends will be very helpful to be able to serve all customers as time goes on . ECONOMICS The game depends on making pizza from raw materials , for examples you need to order flour and use it to make dough to make pizza , so you need to keep an eye on your stocks of raw materials and keep ordering when required , that goes for vegetables and other raw materials as well SHOP UPGRADES The shop will have a lot of upgrades : 1- Buy more ovens 2- Buy more preparing boards 3- Installing Air conditioning system 4- Upgrading to faster goods transfer method 5-advertisments for the shop 6- auto deliveries unload 7- Upgrade ovens to produce more
